entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
